Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.messages.bmp

Messages that talk to the BMP.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BMPBoard
    Wrapper for a board number so that it can't get mixed up with other integers.
    BMPCoords
    A simple description of a BMP to talk to.
    BMPLocation
    Like a core location, but for BMPs.
    BMPReadMemory
    An SCP request to read a region of memory from a BMP.
    BMPReadMemory.Response
    An SCP response to a request to read a region of memory on a chip.
    BMPRequest<T extends BMPRequest.BMPResponse>
    The base class of a request following the BMP protocol.
    BMPRequest.BMPResponse
    Represents an SCP request thats tailored for the BMP connection.
    BMPSetLED
    A request to alter the LEDs on a board.
    BMPWriteMemory
    A request to write memory on a BMP.
    EraseFlash
    A request to erase flash memory on a BMP.
    GetBMPVersion
    An SCP request to read the version of software running on a board's BMP.
    GetFPGAResetStatus
    Get the reset status of a board's FPGAs.
    InitFPGA
    Start an initialisation of the FPGAs.
    ReadADC
    SCP Request for the data from the BMP including voltages and temperature.
    ReadCANStatus
    SCP Request for the CAN bus status data from the BMP.
    ReadFPGARegister
    Requests the data from a FPGA's register.
    ReadIPAddress
    SCP Request for the IP address data from a BMP.
    ReadSerialFlash
    An SCP request to read a region of serial flash from a BMP.
    ReadSerialFlash.Response
    An SCP response to a request to read a region of memory on a chip.
    ReadSerialFlashCRC
    An SCP request to get the CRC of serial flash memory from a BMP.
    ReadSerialFlashCRC.Response
    An SCP response to a request to get the CRC of serial flash.
    ReadSerialVector
    SCP Request for the serial data vector from the BMP.
    ReadSerialVector.SerialVector
    The data read from the serial vector.
    ResetFPGA
    Perform a reset of the FPGAs.
    SerialVector
    The data in the serial vector.
    SetPower
    An SCP request for the BMP to power on or power off a rack of boards.
    UpdateFlash
    A request to update flash memory on a BMP.
    WriteFlashBuffer
    A request to write memory to flash on a BMP.
    WriteFPGAData
    Upload a chunk of FPGA initialisation data.
    WriteFPGARegister
    A request for writing data to a FPGA register.
    WriteSerialFlash
    A request to write to serial flash on a BMP.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BMPInfo
    The SCP BMP Information Types.
    XilinxCommand
    Commands to send to the Xilinx FPGA handler.
